dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 390 IH: Maurice D. Hinchey Hudson River Valley National Heritage Area Enhancement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Stefanik (for herself and Mr. Tonko) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Hudson River Valley National Heritage Area Act of 1996 (Public Law 104–333; 54 U.S.C. 320101 note) to include all of Saratoga and Washington Counties in the boundaries of the Hudson River Valley National Heritage Area.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Maurice D. Hinchey Hudson River Valley National Heritage Area Enhancement Act.

section.header: Hudson River Valley National Heritage Area
section.text: Section 904(b) of the Hudson River Valley National Heritage Area Act of 1996 (Public Law 104â€“333; 54 U.S.C. 320101 note) is amended to read as follows:

subsection.text: The Heritage Area shall be comprised of the counties of Albany, Rensselaer, Columbia, Greene, Ulster, Dutchess, Orange, Putnam, Westchester, Rockland, Saratoga, and Washington, New York.
